Dear IA-Team,

since updating my source branch to include (among many other=
 things)
the proposed fix for [#HER-1109] I'm getting lots of broken ARC fi=
les.
To be more exact, its not the ARC file being broken, but the content
i=
n the ARC file.

Thy symphtom seems to always be the same. The real HTTP re=
sponse
header is mingled with some non-related HTTP header snippets. Those
=
non-related snippet so far ALWAYS contained "Transfer-Encoding:
chunked" - =
this is why I'm suspecting [#HER-1109] to be the cause.

This so far had tw=
o different noticable results:
  - I were able to read the ARCRecord, parse=
 HTTP-Headers but ended up
with some unrelated HTTP-Header stuff in the con=
tent (due to
additional linebreaks from unrelated HTTP-header)
  - I ended =
up with an IndexOutOfBoundsException while reading the
ARCRecord ( ARCRecor=
d.read(ARCRecord.java:410) - I think this reader
is still from heritrix 1.8=
.0 release )
